text: The 2019 Hampton Pirates football team represented Hampton University in the 2019 NCAA Division I FCS football season. They were led by second-year head coach Robert Prunty and played their home games at Armstrong Stadium. They were first-year members of the Big South Conference. They finished the season 5–7, 1–5 in Big South play to finish in a three-way tie for fifth place. ==Preseason== ===Big South poll=== In the Big South preseason poll released on July 21, 2019, the Pirates were predicted to finish in sixth place. {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1 || Kennesaw State || 134 (14) |- align="center" | 2 || Monmouth || 122 (5) |- align="center" | 3 || Charleston Southern || 79 (1) |- align="center" | 4 || Campbell || 73 |- align="center" | 5 || Gardner–Webb || 67 |- align="center" | 6 || Hampton || 64 |- align="center" | 7 || Presbyterian || 21 |- align="center" | — || North Alabama || |} ===Preseason All–Big South team=== The Pirates had one player selected to the preseason all-Big South team. Offense Gibril Ghee – OL ===Headlines=== On August 2, 2019, it was announced that former Florida State quarterback Deondre Francois had completed a graduate transfer to Hampton and would be immediately eligible for the upcoming season. ==Schedule== ==Game summaries== ===Elizabeth City State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 15–7–3 | 1995 | W, 36–13 |} ===Virginia Union=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 40–42–3 | 1994 | W, 56–6 |} ===vs. Howard=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 49–44–1 | 2017 | W, 20–17 |} ===at Liberty=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 2–4 | 1998 | W, 21–0 |} ===North Alabama=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 0–2 | 1993 | L, 20–45 |} ===at Gardner–Webb=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 2–1 | 2005 | W, 52–21 |} ===at Campbell=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" |colspan=3|First meeting |} ===Virginia–Lynchburg=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1–0 | 2018 | W, 51–28 |} ===Presbyterian=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1–0 | 2018 | W, 24–23 |} ===at Charleston Southern=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 0–1 | 2018 | L, 14–48 |} ===Kennesaw State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" |colspan=3|First meeting |} ===at Monmouth=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 0–2 | 2018 | L, 28–56 |} ==References== Hampton Category:Hampton Pirates football seasons Hampton Pirates football
